channel.title: Welcome to SocialHub
channel.description:
SocialHub.ActivityPub.Rocks hosts ActivityPub free software developers and enthusiasts to study and share knowledge, specify functionality together, steer the course of ActivityPub W3C Recommendation through code, conversation, consistency, cooperation...
We welcome both technical and non-technical discussion. Non-technical discussion should focus on cooperation across, between, and beyond projects; governance of the commons; ethics and aesthetics; etc.
_Is it your first time using Discourse? Try sending a message to @discobot._
Each category has a pinned topic (tagged with #about) which explains the expected norms and limits of the category. This facilitates keeping discussion on topic. Don't worry about _drifting_ though: we can always move topics and posts around if needed. Let the conversation be respectful and reproductive!
You can get started with the #welcome topics to get an bird's eye view and feeling about how to engage with this community. Other tags of interest for starters: #faq, #about.
## List of Top-Level Categories
| Category | Purpose |-|- | #activitypub | Protocol interpretation, implementation, and extension | #community | Collective governance of this forum | #fediversity | Understanding and discovering communities in the Fediverse | #meeting | SocialCG meeting announcements and in-person events related to ActivityPub and the Fediverse | #packaging | Distributing federated applications for accessible self-hosting | #software | Several ActivityPub implementation software-focused topics | Missing category? | Please see http://socialhub.activitypub.rocks/t/where-in-socialhub-can-i-talk-about/15
## Caring and Support
If you encounter any problem on SocialHub, you may contact the hosts of the relevant category, the general [contact team](/g/contact), or the [well-being team](/g/well-being.team). You may also [post anonymously](/t/how-to-use-the-anonymous-post-feature/16) to the dedicated [community well-being category](/t/community-well-being/17).
## Want to Help?
Check #todo, read around, reply, join [host groups](/g?filter=hosts), participate in the #meeting:socialcg and feel free to start new topics!

item.title: Welcome to SocialHub
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
Welcome to the SocialHub!

In the last month you joined the ActivityPub community forum, so you might be overwhelmed by all the conversations sprouting around, and it’s normal. The #welcome and #about tags might come handy.

You can use the notification system to avoid having to dive in topics that might not interest you: click the notifications word below for details.

notifications

in each category and topic, you can see a bell icon that, once clicked, will reveal a notification menu:

If you cannot see, the user interface will be different, maybe keyboard shortcuts will be more useful:
typing m while the focus in on the page (not in the composer) will interact with topic notifications, you must type another letter to mute a topic (m again), track a topic (t), or watch a topic (w) ; r will reset the notification for this topic to normal, i.e., you will only receive notifications if you are @mentioned by name. When you participate in a topic, you automatically watch it, when you read it, you automatically track it.

If you’re affiliated with a free #software team, please chime in About the Software category topic so we can setup groups and a dedicated category for your team!

If you’re not a technician, you might want to mute some topics to avoid information overload, and focus on participating in #fediversity. Policy-makers might be interested in participating to #meeting:fediverse-policy.
